oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Riverfront Park Fourth of July Celebration in downtown Nashville, Tennessee, 1987 July 04
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A scene from Nashville’s annual 4th of July Festival at Riverfront Park in 1987. The site is right on the Cumberland River front in the heart of downtown Nashville just off Broadway and 1st Avenue. Forms part of the Kolleen Hudgins, Director of Special Events, Mayor’s Office Collection. 1 color photograph.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hudgins, Kolleen; Fulton, Richard
